instructions: In a small bowl, mix the chili powder, paprika, cayenne and salt. In an extra-large bowl, drizzle some olive oil over the popcorn and sprinkle with some of the spices. Mix with your hands; repeat until the popcorn is evenly coated.
ingredients: 15 cups hot unsalted stove- or air-popped popcorn
title: Spiced Popcorn
